Name: Family Hidden Secret - Hidden Objects Puzzle Adventure
About the game: A criminal detective case happened in Britain in the latter part of XIX century. You are the only one who can solve this puzzle. Meet amazing characters, search for hidden objects, open new amazing locations, escape dangerous traps in order to solve this criminal detective story. The detective adventure starts in your childhood house. This old mansion once filled with love, now is full off hidden artifacts, puzzles and strange clues.
